name: Recall (itch) (merin)
description:
You're a teddy bear who doesn't remember what happened in a toy factory. You will not be welcomed by other toys on this journey from the basement where we woke up to the exit. You will try to remember what happened in the past and who you are. Make sure you collect enough bullets in this adventure where you can play with various weapons, otherwise it will be very difficult for you to escape from the factory. Discover what's going on at the factory, where you've been, and a variety of toys.Credits Ayse Ozgen Berkay Komurcugil Hilal Ceylan Meriç Eren
*This game is created for educational purposes.
